Datatable:
` Cloning Reverse engineer Horatio cloning technology.
Clone Labor Initiative This initiative allows clones to be conscripted as free labor. Though production increases, the economy declines from unemployment Clone Labor
Genetically Engineered Food Act Allows the cloning of cattle and crops, doubling the growth of population. The law also includes subsidies to support the farmers producing the new food. Clone Food
Commercialize Cloning Act Share cloning technology with businesses for commercial purposes such as resurrecting extinct creatures and cloning pets. Unfortunately, this new market draws scientist of almost every field, distracting them from creating new innovations. Clone Fun
Genetic Alteration Lab Purify your Empire by genetically altering the alien population.
Cloning Labs Using the best genes, create new citizens ready to serve their nation.
Generate Forces Dedicate all industrial resources to produce clone troopers.
